roleset.name: break
roleset.note: BREACH-V NOTES: This is rarely used as a real verb, instead usually occuring as anoun:"A breach of contract"etc. It is also used as of a whalecoming up for air, but let's just assume that sense won't occur in WSJ. (from breach.01-v)

example.name: breach the agreement
example.text: Under a merger agreement reached Sept. 14, the UAL board agreed to reimburse certain of the buy-out group's expenses out of company funds even if the transaction wasn't completed, provided the group didn't breach the agreement.
